short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your ultimate tool to effortlessly detect captions in YouTube videos!
short.zh_CN: 轻松检测 YouTube 视频中的字幕！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description

Curious which YouTube videos come with captions? Let CC Scout for YouTube guide you! 💡 Whether you’re learning a new language, improving your viewing experience, or looking for accessibility options, this extension has got you covered! ✨

Key Features

• Automatic Caption Detection 🚀: Instantly shows a “CC” badge next to video titles with captions.
• Flexible Display Options 🌈: Choose between icon or text styles to suit your preference.
• Customizable Badges 🎨: Personalize the badge color to match your style.
• Real-Time Updates 🔄: Scans for newly loaded videos to keep caption info fresh and accurate!

Highlights

• Plug-and-Play 📦: Install and start using it right away—no extra setup needed!
• Fast and Efficient ⚡: Lightweight design ensures smooth performance without slowing you down.
• Multi-Language Support 🌍: Provides details on caption languages and whether they are auto-generated.

Use Cases

• Language Learning 📚: Quickly find videos with captions to boost your language skills.
• Improved Accessibility 👂: Instantly identify videos with captions for a more inclusive experience.
• Enhanced Entertainment 🍿: Save time by filtering high-quality videos with ease.

How to Use?

1. Install the extension and open YouTube 🖥️.
2. As you browse videos, “CC” badges will appear next to titles with captions 🎯.
3. Click the extension icon to customize badge style and color for your personalized experience! 🎨

✨ Install CC Scout for YouTube now and make caption detection effortless and fun! 🎉
long.zh_CN:
简介

想知道哪些 YouTube 视频支持字幕？让 CC Scout for YouTube 为你导航吧！💡无论是学习新语言、提升观看体验，还是满足可访问性需求，这款扩展都能帮你轻松搞定！✨

主要功能

• 自动字幕检测 🚀：在视频标题旁边自动显示 “CC” 标志，字幕支持一目了然！
• 多样化显示 🌈：提供图标和文本两种风格，任你切换。
• 个性化定制 🎨：自由调整徽章颜色，打造属于你的风格。
• 实时更新 🔄：随时扫描新加载的视频，确保字幕信息不掉队！

亮点

• 安装即用 📦：一键安装，无需额外设置，省时省力！
• 快速高效 ⚡：轻量级设计，不卡顿、不占内存。
• 多语言支持 🌍：还能告诉你字幕语言和是否为自动生成，贴心无比。

适用场景

• 语言学习📚：快速找到带字幕的视频，助你轻松提升外语水平。
• 提升可访问性 👂：让有字幕的视频一目了然，为听力受损用户提供便利。
• 娱乐加倍 🍿：更快筛选高质量视频，省去浪费时间的烦恼。

如何使用？

1. 安装扩展后，打开 YouTube 🖥️。
2. 浏览视频时，字幕标记会自动出现在支持字幕的视频标题旁边 🎯。
3. 点击扩展图标，可以自由调整徽章样式和颜色，轻松打造你的专属体验！🎨

✨ 立即安装 CC Scout for YouTube，让字幕检测变得简单又有趣！🎉
